titleStmt.title: A discovery of the rebels by J.V., prisoner.
titleStmt.author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652. Great antichrist.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Vicars. cf. NUC pre-1956.
"The great antichrist", p. 21-44 has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
Entry for V310 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
